verses.t: Moreover{G1161}, brethren{G80}, we do{G1107} you{G5213} to wit{G1107} of the grace{G3588} of God{G3588} bestowed{G1325} on{G1722} the churches{G3588} of Macedonia{G3588};

For{G3754} to{G2596} their power{G1411}, I bear record{G3140}, yea, and{G2532} beyond{G5228} their power{G1411} they were willing of themselves{G830};

I speak{G3004} not{G3756} by{G2596} commandment{G2003}, but{G235} by occasion{G1223} of the forwardness{G4710} of others{G2087}, and{G2532} to prove{G1381} the sincerity{G1103} of your{G5212} love{G26}.

For{G1063} ye know{G1097} the grace{G3588} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, that{G3754}, though he was{G5607} rich{G4145}, yet for{G1223} your sakes{G5209} he became poor{G4433}, that{G2443} ye{G5210} through his{G1565} poverty{G4432} might be rich{G4147}.

And{G2532} herein{G1722} I give{G1325} my advice{G1106}: for{G1063} this{G5124} is expedient{G4851} for you{G5213}, who{G3748} have begun before{G4278}, not{G3756} only{G3440} to do{G4160}, but{G235} also{G2532} to be forward{G2309} a year ago{G4070}.

Now{G3570} therefore{G2532} perform{G2005}the doing{G4160} of it; that{G3704} as{G2509} there was a readiness{G3588} to will{G2309}, so{G3779} there may be a performance{G2005} also{G2532} out of{G1537} that which{G3588} ye have{G2192}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} there be first{G4295} a willing mind{G3588}, it is accepted{G2144} according to that{G2526} a man{G5100} hath{G2192}, and not{G3756} according to{G2526} that he hath{G2192} not{G3756}.
For{G1063} I mean not{G3756} that{G2443} other men{G243} be eased{G425}, and{G1161} ye{G5213} burdened{G2347}:NOTE! There are many tags from the next verse here.

But by an equality, that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want, that{G2443} their{G1565} abundance{G4051} also{G2532} may be{G1096} a supply for{G1519} your{G5216} want{G5303}: that{G3704} there may be{G1096} equality{G2471}:NOTE! As{G2531} it is written{G1125}, He that{G3588} had gathered much{G4183} had{G4121} nothing{G3756} over{G4121}; and{G2532} he that{G3588} had gathered little{G3641} had{G1641} no{G3756} lack{G1641}.
